name: Advanced Software Concepts
overview:
Established in 1992, Advanced Software Concepts (ASC) is well known for its flagship ASC Contracts™ contract management software solution which automates and simplifies buy-side, sell-side, employee, HR and other contract management processes associated with creating and managing contracts or legally binding agreements. The online contract management software provides contract managers and administrators with a secure and searchable database for all contract data and provides feature-rich contract lifecycle capabilities including the ability to capture contract images, intelligent contract management workflows for contract approvals routing, legal terms and conditions control, as well as support for a wide range of contract management applications and processes.

ASC also provides web-based enterprise management solutions for documents, forms, and pricing and quoting. All ASC management software comprises automated document creation and a searchable repository or database with built in reporting, compliance and audit trail capability.

Well suited for any industry (e.g., communications, financial services, energy and utilities, legal services, healthcare, government and education) and organizations of all sizes and complexities, ASC contract lifecycle management (CLM) and business process solutions improve customer, vendor and supplier relationship and commitment management; simplify business processes; ensure compliance, reduce contract risks, and increase efficiency.

ASC has been in the contract management and business process management business for more than 19 years and is an ISO 9001:2008 certified company. Specialties Contract Management, Contract Lifecycle Management (CLM), Pricing & Quoting Management, Document Management, Forms Management, Record Management, Workflow Management, Compliance Management, Sales Configuration
